GDDAY, 
  
PLS OFFER FIRM FOR OUR VERY CLOSE LADY 
  
FULL GUIDANCE HERE 
    
OUR C/P 
  
MV ELISAR 36,781 DWT ON 10,9 | PARADIP, SPOT // ETA SINGAPORE 16 - 18 AUG.                                                                                        
=========================================================================== 
 
BC /36,781 DWT ON 10,9 / BLT 11/2011 ULSAN - KOREA / CLASS DNV / Malta FLAG / GRAIN/BALE 47,894/47,190 M3 
LOA/LBP/B/D 186.4/178/27.8/15.6 M Summer Draft 10.918 mtrs 
  
SPEED/CONSUMPTION: 
AT SEA: LADEN    ABT 13 KNOTS ON 23 MT(IFO380) + 0.10 MT MDO  OR 
           BALLAST  ABT 13.5 KNOTS ON 23 MT(IFO380)  + 0.10 MT MDO 
  
VSL'S SPEED CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER/CALM SEA MAX BEAUFORT 4 / 
DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT WITHOUT GUARANTEE 
  
IN PORT: IDLE    ABT 2.5 MT(IFO380) + 0.10 MT MDO 
       WORKING ABT 4.00 MT(IFO380) + 0.10 MT MDO 
  
ADA & WOG
